CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average watch time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {New Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average watch time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Heavy Users}.

VE.Q: What is New Users's Average Watch Time in 1980?
VE.A: New Users's average watch time in 1980 is {76.43} minutes.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's Average Watch Time in 1990?
VE.A: Premium Users's average watch time in 1990 is {58.17} minutes.

VE.Q: What is New Users's Average Watch Time in 1984?
VE.A: New Users's average watch time in 1984 is {114.38} minutes.

VE.Q: What are the average watch time of Heavy Users, Premium Users, and New Users in 1983?
VE.A: Heavy Users's average watch time is {50.33} minutes, Premium Users's average watch time is {52.42} minutes, New Users's average watch time is {103.51} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Average Watch Time in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total average watch time is {101.76} minutes.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Average Watch Time in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total average watch time is {407.41} minutes.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Heavy Users's Average Watch Time area?
SC.A: The average height of Heavy Users's average watch time area is {46.79} minutes.

SC.Q: What is the average height of New Users's Average Watch Time area?
SC.A: The average height of New Users's average watch time area is {110.26} minutes.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Premium Users's Average Watch Time area?
SC.A: The average height of Premium Users's average watch time area is {47.12} minutes.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Watch Time fall between 182 and 201 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Watch Time exceed 244 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {267.65} minutes in {1987}, total value was {407.41} minutes in {1993}, total value was {339.86} minutes in {1991}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Watch Time go below 139 minutes? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {101.76} minutes in {1972}, total value was {103.06} minutes in {1973}, total value was {111.33} minutes in {1974}.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1992, did the total Average Watch Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1975 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total average watch time between {1971} and {1992} was {larger} than between {1975} and {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1985, did the total Average Watch Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total average watch time between {1970} and {1985} was {larger} than between {1970} and {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1992, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 1982 and 1992?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between {1970} and {1992} was {lower} than between {1982} and {1992}.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1990, did the total Average Watch Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total average watch time between {1977} and {1990} was {larger} than between {1983} and {1991}.
